name: ateliers-fitness
description: Atelier's Fitness - A modern gym app with Next.js frontend and NestJS backend

scripts.lint: pnpm --filter web lint && pnpm --filter api lint
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm --filter web lint:fix && pnpm --filter api lint:fix
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter web typecheck && pnpm --filter api typecheck
scripts.test: pnpm --filter web test && pnpm --filter api test
scripts.test:watch: pnpm --filter web test:watch && pnpm --filter api test:watch
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter web clean && pnpm --filter api clean
